p: In the case of splenic tissue ( Figure 6), nanoparticle-based aggregates were evidenced in the red pulp, with higher tissue concentration at 10 days after injection. Fe 3O 4@EG were absent in the white pulp of the spleen, regardless of the applied treatment. Instead, the splenic white pulpâ€™s time-dependent hypertrophy was observed due to overstimulated production of multilobed nucleated macrophages, a process activated by the EO-conjugated magnetite nanoparticles.
